attributes.action: Have schools let people have days off for mental health
attributes.additional_details: People complain when people not go school, and schools think mental health is important whereas other schools think mental health is a dumb thing for others, and think they use it as an "excuse" and it definitely doesn't help with their mental health.
attributes.background: People deserve to stay home if they're mental health is bad, possibly 2 or 3 days off, and for learning, they can ask the teacher for notes when they weren't in.

rejection.details:
Schools can already allow students days off for their mental health:

https://www.nhsgp.net/can-students-take-mental-health-days/
